about_the_game:
Prove you are human to the anoying CAPTCHA so it lets you through.



Solve puzzles and minigames. Your identity result will change according to your actions as you solve new challenges, be nice (or be as annoying as you wish). Discover different identities to unveil secrets and reach the ending of the story!



GAME FEATURES
  • Fully narrated (by an annoying little guy).
  • More than 30 unique puzzles and minigames to enjoy.
  • Multiple sub-endings to discover.
  • Different action paths to take in most puzzles!
  • Inspired in "There Is No Game". This is a game though.
  • Make the little guy mad, or happy, you do you. I don't like him that much to be honest.
  • A comedic themed story that hides grim secrets.
  • Has an ending!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Sierra 10.12+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Built In

name: Are You Human?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+, 10
  • Processor: Intel HD 4000
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 1 GB or more and should be a DirectX 11-compatible with support for Shader Model 5.0
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Built in

short_description: What are you? The CAPTCHA can't find an answer to that question, and it won’t let you go until it knows your identity. Through minigames and puzzles, you must prove your identity. Follow it's instructions...please, it will cry if you don't.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
